title: Stealing Paradise
description: In this Dateline classic, when two Americans go missing in Panama, locals discover the dark side of a fun-loving bartender. Kate Snow reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 22, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
